DOC.brief_summary: This study is a pilot, double-blind, placebo-controlled, randomized trial aiming to compare the effects of transcranial direct current stimulation in Chronic Migraine.
DOC.brief_title: Transcranial Direct Current Simulation in Chronic Migraine
DOC.detailed_description: The patients will be randomized into 1 of 3 groups: active tDCS over primary motor cortex, active tDCS over prefrontal cortex, sham tDCS. Each group will receive treatment for 20 minutes a day, 3 days a week for 4 weeks.
